Acme Corp Customer Refund Policy (effective Jan 1, 2024; last updated Oct 1, 2024)

When refunds are available

1) Full refunds
- Cancel within 30 days of the initial subscription.
- Service outage exceeds our SLA commitment (99.9% uptime).
- Incorrect billing due to Acme error.

2) Pro-rata refunds
- Cancel an annual subscription mid-term after the 30-day window.
- Downgrade from a higher tier mid-billing cycle.

3) No refunds
- Monthly subscriptions: you can cancel anytime, but no refunds for partial months.
- Usage-based charges already consumed.
- Add-ons (e.g., storage, API calls) already used.

How customers request a refund
- Contact support@acme-corp.com or use in-app chat.
- Provide account email + reason.
- We respond within 2 business days.
- If approved, refunds are processed in 5–7 business days.

Approval thresholds (internal)
- Under $500: CS Representative
- $500–$5,000: CS Manager
- $5,000–$25,000: VP Customer Success
- Over $25,000: CFO

Exception
- Enterprise customers on custom contracts should follow their specific agreement/MSA terms.

Source: refund_policy.md (“Customer Refund Policy”)
